| HistoryText             = Gathered in [[San Pablo]] by the [[Namor McKenzie (Earth-616)|Sub-Mariner]] to destroy a device that could end up destroying the [[Earth]], the [[Norrin Radd (Earth-616)|Silver Surfer]] and the [[Bruce Banner (Earth-616)|Hulk]] worked together with him to crush the dictatorship of [[San Pablo#El General (Earth-616)|El General]] in San Pablo{{r|Sub-Mariner Vol 1 34}} before heading to another island in the [[Caribbean Sea]] controlled by the United Nations where they built a machine designed to control weather patterns. Namor feared that this machine would explode if operated past a certain power level and wanted his [[Atlantean]] scientists to test it to ensure its safety before the U.N. put it into operation.<!-- {{r|Sub-Mariner Vol 1 35}} -->

The military, however, were distrustful of the trio due to their past activities and the government called in the [[Avengers (Earth-616)|Avengers]] to prevent them from destroying the device. [[Anthony Stark (Earth-616)|Iron Man]], [[Thor Odinson (Earth-616)|Thor]], and [[Clinton Barton (Earth-616)|Goliath]] responded to the call, as the other members of the Avengers were gone to do a T.V. charity spot. The Avengers realized their error when [[Ikthon (Earth-616)|Ikthon]] proved to everyone present that the device would have become unstable and exploded if used at full power, just like Namor feared. The Avengers would leave on good terms with the Trio, who would then disband shortly after.{{r|Sub-Mariner Vol 1 35}} They would, however, gather again many times after as a group known as the [[Defenders (Earth-616)|Defenders]].{{r|Defenders Vol 1 2}}
